QuestData.Title: Muahit's Wisdom
QuestData.Description: Listen, $n. Warriors like me are replaceable. If I fall, my brothers and cousins will pick up my spear and fight.$B$BMy people cannot survive without wise elders. Stubborn Muahit, our most venerable shaman, refuses to leave the altar to Tayutka in the central island. We would suffer a significant loss if he was slain by these monsters.$B$BYou are an outsider, maybe he'll listen to you. Show him reason... ask him to flee to the safety of Unu'pe before it's too late.
QuestData.RewardText: Ataika sent you, didn't he? I am not to be swayed.$B$BAll is not lost. The spirits are still with us.
